scripts.start: bun run db:migrate && NODE_ENV=production bun src/app.ts
scripts.test: DATABASE_URL=$TEST_DATABASE_URL sh -c "bun run db:migrate && bun test"
scripts.test:ci: DATABASE_URL=$TEST_DATABASE_URL sh -c "bun run db:migrate && bun test --bail"
scripts.test:watch: DATABASE_URL=$TEST_DATABASE_URL sh -c "bun run db:migrate && bun test --watch"
scripts.db:setup: bun run db:migrate && bun run db:seed
